item.title: Robotic Arm

item.title: Prepare servo-motor
item.description: To attach the Sensorimotor-board to your servo-motor you have to detach the control board of your servo. Unscrew the cover at the back of your servo. Remove the control board desoldering the connections to the Potentiometer. Desolder the cables running from the motor to the control board. Solder new cable to the Potentiometer. Connect Potentiometer and motor to the Sensorimotor-board.
